data.text: Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, yie iwinj kwayona makare;
Kata obedo ni inono chunya kendo itema gotieno,
To kuom gik ma joma moko timo,
Aluongi, yaye Nyasaye, nikech ibiro dwoka;
mondo atony e lwet joma richo ma lawa,
Giselawa kuonde duto, mi koro gilwora,
Gichalo sibuor ma nigi kech mar mako le,
Aa malo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, chomgi tir, mi igogi piny;
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, resa e lwet joma kamago gi lweti,
To anane wangʼi ka ngimana nikare;
